refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: PrimaryIE identifies the most significant word or words in an IndexEntry. IndexEntrys occur in an Index, not in the flow of the text. They are part of a formatted index, not markers for indexing.
If a document includes both IndexTerms and IndexEntrys, the IndexEntrys are usually constructed from the IndexTerms by some external process.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: The PrimaryIE starts a new entry in the Index.
